import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from 'src/app/service/cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { constructor( private service : CartService) { } carts:any[]= []; total:number=0; ngOnInit() : void { } getAllCarts(){ this.service.getAllCarts().subscribe((res:any) =>{ thi }) } }
